profile.description: Show your current profile such as level, health, attack, defense, equipments, and currency

inventory.description:
Showing all of your items
You can check your Equipments, Items, Consumables

cooldown.description: Showing all of your Cooldowns time

boost.description: Showing all of your used booster and see the booster time left

shop.description:
Show what we sell using gold currency.
You can buy anything unless your gold is enough using `.buy`

buy.description: Used to buy anything on the `.shop` with gold currency

sell.description: Used to sell anything from all your item on `.inventory` and get some gold

use.description: Used to use anything from all your item on `.inventory [consumable]`

recipe.description:
Show all the recipes,you can craft `.craft` them 
if u have enough material and level to do so

craft.description:
Used to craft an item that display on `.recipe [page]` 
if you have enough material and level you can craft it

dismantle.description:
Used to dismantle an item that you dont want to 
**NOTE YOU CAN'T DISMANTLE EQUIPMENT AND CONSUMABLE EXCEPT ITEMS**

wooden sword.description: Wooden sword a beginner sword that increase your attack by 3 you can buy on `.shop`
